verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HOLY, HOLY, HOLY, HOLY,
Holy, holy, Lord God Almighty. And we lift our
hearts before You as a token of our love. Holy,
holy, holy, holy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Gracious Father, gracious Father, we're so glad to
be Your children, Heavenly Father. And we lift
our hearts before You as a token of our love.
Gracious Father, gracious Father.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Precious Jesus, precious Jesus, we're so glad
that You redeemed us, precious Jesus. And we
lift our hearts before You as a token of our love.
Precious Jesus, precious Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit, Holy Spirit, come and fill our hearts
anew, Holy Spirit. And we lift our hearts before
You as a token of our love. Holy Spirit, Holy
Spirit.
(Also Hallelujah)
